metadata.title: Get Sentinel Alerts Evidence - incident trigger
metadata.description: This playbook will automatically attach alert evidence from Azure Sentinel alerts and send them to an Event Hub that can be consumed by a 3rd party SIEM solution.
postDeployment: 1. Authorize Microsoft Sentinel, Azure Mionitor Logs, and Event Hub connections.
2. Configure Event Hub to send data to 3rd party solution.

metadata.description: Name of the Resource Group where Microsoft Sentinel is deployed.
Name of the Log Analytics Workspace on which Microsoft Sentinel is deployed.

body.ContentData:
@{base64(concat('"{','
','"Alert Display Name": "',items('For_each_-_alert')?['properties']?['alertDisplayName'],'",','
','"Alert URI":"',items('For_each_-_alert')?['properties']?['alertLink'],'",','
','"Product Name":"',items('For_each_-_alert')?['properties']?['productName'],'",','
','"AlertEntites":"',triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['relatedEntities'],'",','
','"AlertsDescription": "',items('For_each_-_alert')?['properties']?['description'],'",','
','"Severity":"',items('For_each_-_alert')?['properties']?['severity'],'",','
','"System Alert Id":"',items('For_each_-_alert')?['properties']?['systemAlertId'],'",','
','"Alert Time":"',items('For_each_-_alert')?['properties']?['timeGenerated'],'",','
','"Resource Group":"',triggerBody()?['workspaceInfo']?['ResourceGroupName'],'",','
','"Subscription Id":"',triggerBody()?['workspaceInfo']?['SubscriptionId'],'",','
','"Alert type":"',items('For_each_-_alert')?['properties']?['alertType'],'",','
','"Provider Alert ID":"',items('For_each_-_alert')?['properties']?['providerAlertId'],'",','
','"Alert Start Time":"',items('For_each_-_alert')?['properties']?['startTimeUtc'],'",','
','"Alert End time":"',items('For_each_-_alert')?['properties']?['endTimeUtc'],'",','
','"Incident ID": "',triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['incidentNumber'],'",','
','"Incident description": "',triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['description'],'",','
','"Incident URL": "',triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['incidentUrl'],'",','
','"Incident MITRE Tactic": "',triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['additionalData']?['tactics'],'",','
','"Incident MITRE Techniques": "',triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['additionalData']?['techniques'],'",','
','"Events":"',json(string(body('Parse_JSON_-_parse_alert_events'))),'",','
','}"','
','
','
'))}
